languages.text: "От себя хочу отметить, что юный Винтерскейл уже почти как новенький. Благодаря усилиям наших хирургеонов и талантам господина ван Калокса, он быстро пошел на поправку. Разве что с выколотым глазом мы так ничего и не смогли сделать, но уверен, что господин Эвейн сможет позволить себе достойный имплант на замену".

"On a personal note, young Winterscale is almost as good as new. Thanks to the efforts of our chirurgeons and the talents of Master van Calox, he has made a speedy recovery, except for the gouged eye, which we were unable to save. But I am sure Lord Evayne will be able to afford a decent implant to replace it."
languages.original_text: "От себя хочу отметить, что юный Винтерскейл уже почти как новенький. Благодаря усилиям наших хирургеонов и талантам господина ван Калокса, он быстро пошел на поправку. Разве что с выколотым глазом мы так ничего и не смогли сделать, но уверен, что господин Эвейн сможет позволить себе достойный имплант на замену".

traits.locale_text: "On a personal note, young Winterscale is almost as good as new. Thanks to the efforts of our chirurgeons and the talents of Master van Calox, he has made a speedy recovery, except for the gouged eye, which we were unable to save. But I am sure Lord Evayne will be able to afford a decent implant to replace it."

"On a personal note, young Winterscale is almost as good as new. Thanks to the efforts of our chirurgeons and the talents of Master van Calox, he has made a speedy recovery, except for the gouged eye, which we were unable to save. But I am sure Lord Evayne will be able to afford a decent implant to replace it."

"On a personal note, young Winterscale is almost as good as new. Thanks to the efforts of our chirurgeons and the talents of Master van Calox, he has made a speedy recovery, except for the gouged eye, which we were unable to save. But I am sure Lord Evayne will be able to afford a decent implant to replace it."

"On a personal note, young Winterscale is almost as good as new. Thanks to the efforts of our chirurgeons and the talents of Master van Calox, he has made a speedy recovery, except for the gouged eye, which we were unable to save. But I am sure Lord Evayne will be able to afford a decent implant to replace it."

languages.text: "Es sei hinzugefügt, dass der junge Winterzunder so gut wie neu ist. Dank der Bemühungen unserer Chirurgeums und der Talente von Meister van Calox hat er sich rasch erholt, bis auf das Augen, das wir nicht retten konnten. Aber ich bin sicher, Lord Evayne wird sich ein anständiges Implantat leisten können, um es zu ersetzen."
languages.original_text: "On a personal note, young Winterscale is almost as good as new. Thanks to the efforts of our chirurgeons and the talents of Master van Calox, he has made a speedy recovery, except for the gouged eye, which we were unable to save. But I am sure Lord Evayne will be able to afford a decent implant to replace it."

traits.locale_text: "Es sei hinzugefügt, dass der junge Winterzunder so gut wie neu ist. Dank der Bemühungen unserer Chirurgeums und der Talente von Meister van Calox hat er sich rasch erholt, bis auf das Augen, das wir nicht retten konnten. Aber ich bin sicher, Lord Evayne wird sich ein anständiges Implantat leisten können, um es zu ersetzen."

languages.text: “在我看来，年轻的温特斯凯尔勋爵已经彻底康复了。在我们外科医生的不懈努力，以及冯·卡洛克斯大师力量的帮助下，他恢复得很快。虽然我们没能恢复那颗被挖出来的眼睛，但我相信，艾维尼勋爵肯定能负担得起体面的植入物，换颗新的眼球。”
languages.original_text: "On a personal note, young Winterscale is almost as good as new. Thanks to the efforts of our chirurgeons and the talents of Master van Calox, he has made a speedy recovery, except for the gouged eye, which we were unable to save. But I am sure Lord Evayne will be able to afford a decent implant to replace it."

traits.locale_text: “在我看来，年轻的温特斯凯尔勋爵已经彻底康复了。在我们外科医生的不懈努力，以及冯·卡洛克斯大师力量的帮助下，他恢复得很快。虽然我们没能恢复那颗被挖出来的眼睛，但我相信，艾维尼勋爵肯定能负担得起体面的植入物，换颗新的眼球。”

languages.text: « Sur une note plus personnelle, le jeune Winterscale est presque comme neuf. Grâce aux efforts combinés de nos chirurgeons et de maître von Calox, il s'est rétabli en un temps record, même s'ils n'ont malheureusement pas pu sauver son œil. Nul doute que le seigneur Evayne le remplacera par un implant digne de ce nom. »
languages.original_text: "On a personal note, young Winterscale is almost as good as new. Thanks to the efforts of our chirurgeons and the talents of Master van Calox, he has made a speedy recovery, except for the gouged eye, which we were unable to save. But I am sure Lord Evayne will be able to afford a decent implant to replace it."

traits.locale_text: « Sur une note plus personnelle, le jeune Winterscale est presque comme neuf. Grâce aux efforts combinés de nos chirurgeons et de maître von Calox, il s'est rétabli en un temps record, même s'ils n'ont malheureusement pas pu sauver son œil. Nul doute que le seigneur Evayne le remplacera par un implant digne de ce nom. »

languages.text: «En asuntos de carácter personal, el joven Winterscale está como nuevo, o casi. Gracias a los esfuerzos de nuestros cirujanos y los talentos del maestro van Calox, se ha recuperado completamente a excepción del ojo, que no pudimos salvar. Sin embargo, no me cabe duda de que lord Evayne podrá permitirse un implante decente para sustituirlo».
languages.original_text: "On a personal note, young Winterscale is almost as good as new. Thanks to the efforts of our chirurgeons and the talents of Master van Calox, he has made a speedy recovery, except for the gouged eye, which we were unable to save. But I am sure Lord Evayne will be able to afford a decent implant to replace it."

traits.locale_text: «En asuntos de carácter personal, el joven Winterscale está como nuevo, o casi. Gracias a los esfuerzos de nuestros cirujanos y los talentos del maestro van Calox, se ha recuperado completamente a excepción del ojo, que no pudimos salvar. Sin embargo, no me cabe duda de que lord Evayne podrá permitirse un implante decente para sustituirlo».

languages.text: 「大した話ではありませんが、若きウィンタースケールはすでにほぼ完治しております。チラージョンの尽力とマスター・ヴァン・カロックスの能力のおかげで急速に回復したようです。どうしても救うことのできなかった、えぐり取られた目を除いてですが。とはいえ、エヴァイン卿であれば、その代わりとなる適切なインプラントを手に入れることはできるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "On a personal note, young Winterscale is almost as good as new. Thanks to the efforts of our chirurgeons and the talents of Master van Calox, he has made a speedy recovery, except for the gouged eye, which we were unable to save. But I am sure Lord Evayne will be able to afford a decent implant to replace it."

traits.locale_text: 「大した話ではありませんが、若きウィンタースケールはすでにほぼ完治しております。チラージョンの尽力とマスター・ヴァン・カロックスの能力のおかげで急速に回復したようです。どうしても救うことのできなかった、えぐり取られた目を除いてですが。とはいえ、エヴァイン卿であれば、その代わりとなる適切なインプラントを手に入れることはできるでしょう」

languages.text: "Şahsi görüşüm, Genç Winterscale'in turp gibi olduğu yönünde. Cerrahlarımızın çabaları ve Üstat van Calox'un marifeti sayesinde hızla kendini toparladı. Oyulmuş gözü hariç. Gözü kurtaramadık ama eminim Lord Evayne, iyi bir implantın masraflarını karşılayabilecek durumdadır."
languages.original_text: "On a personal note, young Winterscale is almost as good as new. Thanks to the efforts of our chirurgeons and the talents of Master van Calox, he has made a speedy recovery, except for the gouged eye, which we were unable to save. But I am sure Lord Evayne will be able to afford a decent implant to replace it."

traits.locale_text: "Kişisel bir not düşmem gerekirse: Genç Winterscale tamamen iyileşti. Cerrahlarımızın çabaları ve Üstat van Calox'un marifeti sayesinde hızla kendini toparladı. Oyulmuş gözü hariç. Gözü kurtaramadık ama eminim Lord Evayne iyi bir implantın masraflarını karşılayabilecek durumdadır."
